There better time than salute of Negro
daily newspapers The Atlanta Daily World published Atlanta
Ca.


The Atlanta World founded in August 1928 by A Scott


published weekly until the Spring of $780, when became
sem1-weekly.


January Of 1881 the Southern Newspaper Syndicate formed
ougrowth Of the Atlanta World. Semweeklies
ablished Birmingham Alabama Columbus, Georgia, Chat
tanooga, Tenn.


On April TO- 1884, the Atlanta World and affiliated


weeklies In June full Of comics by Negro artists
begun and later started the first and only section
published weekly by Negroes and distributed nationally


In June 1884, the Memphis World established in Memphis
Tenn and continues today semweeky being distributed
Tuesday and Friday.


On March 10, 1882 the Atlanta World changed from trweeky
daily publishing five weekly and Sunday edition for each
week for weeks when became 7da daily and for
the only daily published and owned Negroes the
United States admitted membership the Audit Bureau
Circulation February 1884, just prior the founders DEATH
Several newspapers added the Southern Newspaper Syndicate
and early 1885, the changed the Scott Newspaper
Syndicate.


The Daily World SN under the
c. A. Scott younger brother of the founder his and
several other members the Scott family who
Of the newspapers.

A monkey and lion in zoo
we're stricken by a type of in
fluenza. In an effort to prevent
the spread of the contagious d.
sease, the zoo superintendent de-
cided to try new approach. He
placed medication in the venti-
lating system and let It be waited
to the animals. This, he ex-
planned, is what is known as
medical air for the Gagged.

Paper accounts for some Of the
most educational activities in the
world when we think of the mil
lions Of books and pamphlets
written for students. Conversely,
paper accounts for most of the
litter present in the homes and
streets and parks of the world,
also.


Imagine day without any paper
products in your home, on the job.
at dinner or at school


Paper usage has grown since
its invention in the days of the
Chinese or the Russians, who
claim inventing the writing
material. Paper production can
be used to trace the social Gus
toms and educational progresses
within a certain civilization.


The rise and the fall of the Ro-
man Empire can be studied
through the series of letters,
histories and recollections of
men who lived during that era.


Scrolls unearthed in the
modern time which we're written
centuries ago = relate many un-
known facts. We take for granted
many books and magazines today,
but years ago, there were few
books or gaines available.


Books and magazines we're not
a common household item. No
one knew Of facial tissues, nor
paper towels. A paper plate was
a step forward as man learned
to improve paper production.


Americans who live in the
United States are the greatest
consumers of paper products in
the world. We use more cartons,
packages and wrapping paper than
any nation.


have emptied at least a mil
lion pounds of paper trash since
my sixth year. have used over
a million sheets of writing and
tipping paper since the first grade.


We have reached the stage
where paper Is an offender
in the hands Of thoughtless per-
son. Paper dropped on the streets
and in the parks cause ugliness.
Paper blows from place to place
and cutters the yards and alley
ways.


Loose paper and piles of dry
paper cause fires.


Paper Is of great value when
properly used. Paper has little
value when 1t becomes litter. The
man who invents self-disposable
paper will reap the greatest
honors and glories available.

The troubles in Africa just beginning.
nations arrive their goals of independence
growing pains will be noticed


The unfortunate and misguided killings whites
communsc inspired shameful However, it has been
within the twentieth century when Belgian king
OF any Congo worker to be chopped off he caught stealing
diamond


One wrong does another wrong
policy adopted by many problems
Africa.


1t is hard for in the United States
the terrible conditions existing the newly emerging
Africa. There few schools DOCTORS industries and
little capital.


Africa contains of the worlds mineral supplies
and forests regions has wealth in palm OIL
base) and various fruits and spices.


Each nation which has independence also
and all leaders seeking any nation
that is willing give it.

AND REVIEWS


Edward Banks

death here IN Phoenix be cause Of M,aUented
gas heaters. Throughout the Uolley thousands
of unsafe due lhngS are o,Oned or rented by
MaSusbe citing persons sOh0 do not know that
the lack OF a city housing code may be tragic.


The efforts Of many we'll meaning, hon.
ever, miSdiYe cted v0teYS repealed the houS-
ing code. In their sho1tsighted nay they led q
great force Of persons to believe that indi-
vida1ol rights we're being taken away with the
enforcement Of a uniform housing code.


This type Of reasoning could easily lead
us back to the days Of the plaques because
mass inanatsization is an infringement on
Individual rights This type Of irrational
thinking could easily ShoaO how a uniform
sOateY and sewage system are wrong.


Before the next city election comes,
total effort by every church, school and CHIC
group interested IN Improving our city should
be dire cted toWuYd yeUiUing the housing code.


Fen cities the size of Phoenix are without
a city housing code. There are many areas
where more goUe p7anaental control is not
desired, but certainly providing minimum
health and safety regulations which ulti-
m0tely affect the entire city and state can
remain too indiUidat0l
